## Analysis of the general price of beef 

Importation of the dataset:
- Price 
- Monthly data
- Start from 1990 to 2021

```{r}
Beef_data <- read.csv2("../Data/BeefPrice.csv")
Commodity_global_price_index <- read.csv("../Data/Commodity.price.index.csv")
Beef_production_world <- read.csv("../Data/beef-and-buffalo-meat-production-tonnes.csv")
Beef_US_price <- read.csv("../Data/Beef_price_US.csv")
```

```{r}
write.csv(Beef_data,"../Data/Beef_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
